message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
